content: crochet your own iconic banana on the wall crohet pattern the inspiration behind this crochet pattern comes from the infamous art piece comedian by maurizio cattelan which gained worldwide attention for its simplicity and bold statement this artwork featured a real banana taped to a wall sparking conversations about the nature of art and its value these are the required tools and materials alize cotton gold yellow black gray crochet hook size 3 polyester fibrefill for stuffing stitch marker or a thread of contrasting colour yarn needle scissors wire to fix the ducktape in place felt tip pen brown this pattern is designed for crocheters with basic skill level it involves basic crochet stitches increasing and decreasing required skills magic_ring magic_ring chain chain single_crochet double_crochet increase increase decrease decrease we will start with the magic_ring magic_ring 6 single_crochet round 1 6 single_crochet 6 change color to yellow round 2 6 increase 12 round 3 12 single_crochet 12 round 4 1 single_crochet 1 increase 18 round 5 2 single_crochet 1 increase 24 rounds 6 to 23 24 single_crochet 24 round 24 1 decrease 4 single_crochet 1 decrease 5 single_crochet 1 increase 4 single_crochet 1 increase 5 single_crochet 24 rounds 25 to 30 24 single_crochet 24 round 31 1 decrease 4 single_crochet 1 decrease 5 single_crochet 1 increase 4 single_crochet 1 increase 5 single_crochet 24 rounds 32 to 37 24 single_crochet 24 round 38 1 decrease 4 single_crochet 1 decrease 5 single_crochet 1 increase 4 single_crochet 1 increase 5 single_crochet 24 rounds 39 to 44 24 single_crochet 24 round 45 1 decrease 4 single_crochet 1 decrease 5 single_crochet 1 increase 4 single_crochet 1 increase 5 single_crochet 24 round 46 to round 51 24 single_crochet 24 do not forget to fill as you go round 52 2 single_crochet 1 decrease 18 round 53 1 single_crochet decrease 12 rounds 54 to 59 12 single_crochet 12 change to color black round 60 12 single_crochet 12 fill completely woith microfill and close the gap finish off duct tape gray chain 16 or as much as you believe the width of the duct tape should be turn your work around skip the 1st stitch and start crocheting into the 2nd stitch make as many row you think fit insert wire around the duct tape to help it stand propperly around the banana draw some brown stains on the banana using the felt tip pen banana will now look ads real watchout someone may mistake it for a real one sew the dust tape in the middle of the banana and now the art piece is ready to be put on the wall you do not have to worry it will not become bad and nobody will eat it either follow us on instagram for more fun and enjoyble crochet projects
